name: gluing mill construction | gluing mill | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/22711/documentation

This dataset represents the construction of a medium sized gluing plant for the production of glued timber products, such as glue laminated timber, cross laminated timber, glued solid timber and similar products.;The modelled plant is located adjacent to the sawmill in which the timber is sawn before gluing.

From the reception at the factory gate of all materials and fuels used.

The land area and the material and their transports needed for building and disposal of a gluing plant with a yearly output of 12'000 m3 glued lamianted timber per year is included. The storage are of finished products is included.
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/429:Construction of other civil engineering projects/4290:Construction of other civil engineering projects

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data for Switzerland used for Central Europe
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Medium sized gluing mill, located with sawmill
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Sampling of three GLULAM producers in Switzerland
